holidays.title: Day of Unity
holidays.description: This is the signature event of National Bullying Prevention Month.

holidays.title: Flora Duffy Day
holidays.description: Today we join Bermuda in celebrating Flora Duffy and her Olympic achievements.

holidays.title: Hagfish Day
holidays.description: Today, we learn that, although not cuties, these creatures play an important role in nature.

holidays.title: Health Care Aide Day
holidays.description: Health Care Aide Day was created by the government of Manitoba, Canada, to honor healthcare aides.

holidays.title: Kati Bihu
holidays.description: Let us celebrate the solemn occasion of the paddy season's beginning.

holidays.title: National Alaska Day
holidays.description: Alaska is the largest state to join the U.S. and it is its last frontier, too.

holidays.title: National BRA Day
holidays.description: Together, let’s honor the strong women fighting breast cancer and help them make informed decisions.

holidays.title: National Ken Day
holidays.description: We know about Ken from Barbie. But where did the name come from? Let’s find out!

holidays.title: National Louie Day
holidays.description: It’s time to shout out every Louie you know on their special day!

holidays.title: National Mark Day
holidays.description: Happy National Mark Day! Let’s celebrate everyone with the most popular male name.

holidays.title: National Mashed Potato Day
holidays.description: The potato is so awesome that an entire day is dedicated to celebrating it!

holidays.title: National Medical Assistants Day
holidays.description: A great time to explore this important, fast-growing career.

holidays.title: National Necktie Day
holidays.description: Put on a necktie and prepare to celebrate this special day in style!

holidays.title: National No Beard Day
holidays.description: Going clean shaven could give you a totally new outlook on life!

holidays.title: National Prayer Day
holidays.description: Did you know different religions have varying forms of prayers? Join us as we learn more.

holidays.title: National Speak Up for Victims of Sexual Abuse Day
holidays.description: The purpose of this day is to provide help and strength to sexually abused people.

holidays.title: National Sunday Day
holidays.description: It’s National Sunday Day! Let’s celebrate and appreciate everyone named Sunday today.

holidays.title: National Zane Day
holidays.description: If you or anyone you know is called Zane, now is your day to shine!

holidays.title: Ride To Work Day
holidays.description: Prepare your bicycles and helmets for a ride to work to help you get in shape!

holidays.title: Support Your Local Chamber of Commerce Day
holidays.description: Don’t forget to thank your local chambers of commerce for their contribution to sustaining the economy!

holidays.title: World Menopause Day
holidays.description: Gear up to spread awareness about a condition that affects all women.

holidays.title: Baby Bash’s Birthday
holidays.description: The talented rapper has collaborated with other famous artists to create great hits!

holidays.title: Chuck Berry’s Birthday
holidays.description: We celebrate the lasting legacy created by the “Father of Rock ‘n’ Roll,” Chuck Berry.

holidays.title: Dawn Wells’s Birthday
holidays.description: The performances of this brilliant actress are what have garnered her love and admiration.

holidays.title: Esperanza Spalding’s Birthday
holidays.description: She rose to prominence as a young violinist before learning the upright bass as a teenager.

holidays.title: FaZe Banks’s Birthday
holidays.description: As a child, he enjoyed playing video games, an enthusiasm that he channeled into a career.

holidays.title: Jean-Claude Van Damme’s Birthday
holidays.description: Jean-Claude has a track record of success in both semi-contact and full-contact kickboxing.

holidays.title: Lindsey Vonn’s Birthday
holidays.description: With victory after victory coming her way, she’s carving her name in the history of skiing.

holidays.title: Mike Ditka’s Birthday
holidays.description: Whether as a player or a coach, he strives to bring victory to his team.

holidays.title: Nadji Jeter’s Birthday
holidays.description: Be it in front of or behind the camera, whatever the task, he always delivers.

holidays.title: Ne-Yo’s Birthday
holidays.description: The famous ‘Miss Independent’ singer has 15 Grammy nominations and three wins!

holidays.title: nyesha arrington’s Birthday
holidays.description: Inspiring, motivating, and socially aware, this chef is not putting down her knife any time soon.

holidays.title: Patrick Bet-David’s Birthday
holidays.description: From rags to riches, he is truly the embodiment of hard work begets success.

holidays.title: Racha Taki’s Birthday
holidays.description: She was born into a family of artists and continues their legacy to this day.

holidays.title: Sassy’s Birthday
holidays.description: She is not only a multi-faceted star but also a plant mom.

holidays.title: Tyler Posey’s Birthday
holidays.description: “If you've ever doubted pure talent, then you've not met the real deal.” — Tyler Posey.

holidays.title: Zac Efron’s Birthday
holidays.description: This star still draws much attention as every girl’s crush and every man’s idol.
